name: ALTAIR BREAKER
summary:
THE WORLD OF ALTAIR
Set on the floating island of Vastus Isle, once a magic workshop now in ruins and exploited to run AI experiments. Take on battles to push back the army of LAWS (Lethal Autonomous Weapons Systems) that are roaming around and help Stella, the humanoid AI left in charge of ALTAIR, to maintain peace.

BATTLE SYSTEM
Move from map to map while enjoying the feeling of transcendent sword fighting.
Take advantage of your surroundings by climbing and gliding to easily take on enemies....
